title: [Gyldemar Forest, Defile]
description: Small scorch marks dot the surface of the rocks forming the defile.  Wind gusts stir up the small twigs and ash that litter the area.  The trunk of a blasted tree lies across the defile, forcing travellers to stoop low to keep their heads uninjured.

Small scorch marks dot the surface of the rocks, barely visible at night, forming the defile.  Wind gusts stir up the small twigs and ash that litter the area.  The trunk of a blasted tree lies across the defile, forcing travellers to stoop low to keep their heads uninjured.
